bug.author: manycoding
bug.description:
A very minor issue thanks to which I found a bigger one in my package.
Since the logger is <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pandas-profiling/pandas-profiling/blob/8a6e6103b254ac065a0a14b91bade760ccb19d89/pandas_profiling/config.py#L21>anonymous</denchmark-link> , the only way to disable it is to change the level globally. Wouldn't it be nice to use <denchmark-link:https://docs.python.org/3/library/logging.html#logging.getLogger>getLogger()</denchmark-link> : <denchmark-code>logger = logging.getLogger("pandas-profiling") logger.debug() </denchmark-code>
So other people can: logging.getLogger("pandas-profiling").setLevel(logging.CRITICAL) Version information: 2.0.3

comments.comment: Fixed in v2.1.0 by removing the one logging statement.
